words.context_notes: Most offensive Dutch curse, cancer-related. Extremely taboo and socially unacceptable. Often used by teens despite social stigma.
words.cultural_context: Disease-based swearing unique to Dutch culture

words.context_notes: Combination of kanker + lijer (sufferer). One of the most offensive possible Dutch insults.
Typhoid-based curse. Less taboo than kanker as typhoid is historical. Used as adjective for unpleasant things.
words.cultural_context: Disease-based swearing, historical disease less socially sensitive

words.context_notes: Tuberculosis-based curse. Commonly used disease-based swear, less severe than kanker.
Tuberculosis variant. Milder of the disease-based curses.
Cholera-based curse. Disconnected from disease origins in modern usage.
words.cultural_context: Disease-based curse with weakened association to original disease

words.context_notes: Female genitalia reference. Extremely versatile - used as expletive, adjective, adverb. Can describe feelings or weather.
words.compound_potential: Very high - kutwijf, kutfiets, kutzooi, kutding
words.cultural_context: One of most versatile Dutch curse words

words.context_notes: Combination of kut + wijf (derogatory woman). Female equivalent of klootzak.
words.cultural_context: Gendered insult combining vulgar anatomy with derogatory term for woman

words.context_notes: Male genitalia reference. Used to describe unsympathetic man or as general insult meaning asshole/prick.
Literally 'scrotum/ball sack'. Used for irritating, annoying or disagreeable person.
words.cultural_context: Very common Dutch insult using male anatomy

words.context_notes: From kloten (testicles). Used as expletive, adjective, or adverb like 'kut'.
Creative compound: kloot (ball) + viool (violin). Humorous insult.
words.cultural_context: Example of Dutch creative/humorous compound cursing

words.context_notes: Prostitute. Often combined with other terms.
Compound: stoep (sidewalk) + hoer. Streetwalker reference.
Verb meaning 'to fuck'. Used in compounds and expressions.
words.cultural_context: Primary Dutch equivalent to English f-word

words.context_notes: Literally 'ant fucker'. Someone who obsesses over minor details, nitpicker. Can be verb (mierenneuken).
words.cultural_context: Creative metaphorical compound showing Dutch linguistic creativity

words.context_notes: Direct translation of 'goddammit'. Standalone expression of frustration or anger.
words.cultural_context: Religious blasphemy common in secular Netherlands

words.context_notes: Shortened version of godverdomme for milder impact. Equivalent to 'damn'.
Euphemism for godverdomme. Socially acceptable, used around children and in professional settings.
words.cultural_context: Socially acceptable euphemism showing Dutch politeness strategies

words.context_notes: Used like in English - shock, frustration, disbelief. Mild blasphemy.
Literally 'acorn'. Similar to klootzak but milder. Describes foolish rather than malicious behavior.
words.cultural_context: Mild metaphorical insult using natural imagery

words.context_notes: Mild slang for female private parts. Used as insult for women.
words.cultural_context: Milder anatomical term used as gendered insult

words.context_notes: Slut, promiscuous woman. Derogatory term for women.
Penis, dick. Anatomical slang.
Diminutive of lul. Milder due to diminutive form (-je ending).
words.cultural_context: Shows Dutch diminutive softening of harsh language

words.context_notes: Literally 'pancake'. Used as mild insult meaning fool or idiot.
Compound: suf (drowsy/dull) + kop (head). Meaning dullard or dimwit.
Idiot. Standard mild insult about intelligence.
Dimwit, someone pitiable rather than contemptible. Relatively mild.
words.cultural_context: Mild term combining pity and mild contempt

words.context_notes: From stom (stupid). Meaning fool or dummy.
From dom (stupid). Very mild insult meaning dummy.
Compound: kut + zooi (mess). Meaning fucking mess or shitty situation.
Compound: klote + zooi. Similar to kutzooi but slightly milder.
English loanword. Common among Dutch speakers due to English proficiency.
English loanword. Commonly used by younger Dutch speakers.
words.cultural_context: English influence on Dutch profanity, generational

words.context_notes: English loanword. Popular among younger generations.
words.cultural_context: English gendered insult adopted by Dutch youth

words.context_notes: Flemish (Belgian) creative way of cursing God. Regional to Belgium.
Flemish: baby cow, meaning childish hapless idiot. Regional to Belgium.
Flemish: despicable idiot or dimwit. Regional to Belgium.
Devil. Often in phrase 'loop naar de duivel' (go to the devil). More common in Belgium.
words.cultural_context: Religious reference, more Catholic influence in Belgium

words.context_notes: Mild euphemism, similar to 'darn it'. Very socially acceptable.
Shit, feces. Scatological term.
Childish term for poop. Very mild, often used with children.
Childish term for crap/poop. Very mild.
Turd. Mild scatological term, often diminutive.
words.cultural_context: Mild scatological term with diminutive forms

words.context_notes: Compound: rot (rotten) + zooi (mess). Meaning mess or rubbish situation.
words.cultural_context: Common compound for describing bad situations

words.context_notes: Compound: rot (rotten) + kop (head). Meaning jerk or asshole.
To piss/urinate. Also used as verb meaning to whine or complain.
words.cultural_context: Bodily function term with extended metaphorical use

words.context_notes: Compound: zeik (piss) + nerd. Someone who constantly complains.
words.cultural_context: Modern compound combining bodily function with English loanword

words.context_notes: Mild term for pee/urine. Child-friendly.
Fart. Mild bodily function term.
Stupid (adjective). Very mild when used as 'stomme idioot' etc.
Retarded. Ableist slur that's socially problematic.
words.cultural_context: Ableist term becoming less socially acceptable

words.context_notes: Extremely offensive ableist slur. Historically used for Down syndrome, now recognized as highly inappropriate.
words.cultural_context: Ableist slur that's highly socially unacceptable

words.context_notes: Imbecile. Ableist term for someone with intellectual disability, used as general insult.
words.cultural_context: Ableist medical term repurposed as insult

words.context_notes: Crazy/mad. Mild term that can be affectionate or mildly insulting depending on context.
words.cultural_context: Mild mental health-related term with context-dependent meaning

words.context_notes: Bag/sack. Used as mild insult meaning jerk, especially in compounds.
words.cultural_context: Base word for many Dutch compound insults

words.context_notes: Derogatory term for woman. Archaic but still used in compounds like kutwijf.
words.cultural_context: Archaic derogatory term for women, mainly in compounds

words.context_notes: Female dog, bitch. Derogatory term for women.
Witch. Mild derogatory term for difficult woman.
Carrion, corpse of animal. Used as harsh insult for women meaning bitch or nasty person.
Slang term meaning idiot or fool. Relatively mild.
Ape. Mild animal-based insult.
Ape-person. Mild compound insult.
Idiot. Mild slang term.
Anus knight. Creative compound insult.
Banana. Racial slur for Asian people. Highly offensive.
Bastard. Traditional insult.
Mild curse word. Euphemistic.
Crook, rascal. Mild term.
Blockhead. Mild insult.
Dumb head. Compound: dom (dumb) + kop (head).
Stupid (adjective). Very mild.
Fool. From dom (stupid).
Thunder. Mild curse word.
Box. Slang for vagina.
Dragon. Mild insult for ugly woman.
Grape. Very mild, almost humorous insult.
Creep. Mild insult for creepy person.
Pus mouth. Compound: etter (pus) + bak (mouth).
English loanword. Homophobic slur. Highly offensive.

words.context_notes: Faggot. Highly offensive homophobic slur.
English loanword. Common intensifier among Dutch speakers.

words.context_notes: Bile mouth. Compound: gal (bile) + bak (mouth).
Crazy person (diminutive). Can be affectionate or mildly insulting.

words.context_notes: Goat fucker. Creative compound insult.
Variant of godverdomme. Goddammit.
Mild variant of godverdomme. Gosh darn.
Disgusting (adjective). Mild.
Half-baked. Mild intelligence insult.
Whore fucker. Sexual compound insult.
Son of a whore. Compound: hoer + jong (boy).
Whore child. Compound: hoer + kind (child).
Homosexual. Can be neutral or offensive depending on context and tone.
Dog dick. Animal-anatomical compound insult.
Dog fucker. Animal-sexual compound insult.
Brute, jerk. Variant of hufter.
Jerk, asshole. Common mild insult.
Imbecile. Ableist medical term used as insult.

words.context_notes: Derogatory slang term for women.
Mild variant of jezus. Gee whiz.
Jew. Can be neutral or highly offensive slur depending on context.

words.context_notes: Jewish trick. Antisemitic compound. Highly offensive.
To crap (verb). Very mild childish term.
Cancer mouth. Extremely offensive disease-based compound.
Cancer whore. Extremely offensive disease-sexual compound.
Cancer kid. Extremely offensive disease-based compound.
Cancer mongoloid. Combination of worst possible Dutch insults. Extremely offensive.

words.context_notes: Cancer faggot. Combination of disease curse and homophobic slur. Extremely offensive.

Cancer mess. Extremely offensive disease-based compound for situations.

Cholera. Variant of kolere.
Cholera mess. Disease-based compound.
Clumsy fool. Mild slang insult.
To mess around (verb). Mild.
Testicle. Anatomical term.
Testicle people. Derogatory term for rabble or lower classes.
Shitty thing. Compound: klote + ding (thing).
Dimwit, bumbler. Mild with pity connotation.
Coolie. Racial slur for Asian laborers. Highly offensive.
Cholera sufferer. Disease-based compound.
Ass licker. Anatomical-sexual compound insult.

Cunt thing. Compound: kut + ding (thing).
Cunt bike. Creative compound showing Dutch versatility with kut.

Lame sack. Mild insult for lazy person.
Wimp, weakling. Mild insult.
Lesbian. Can be neutral or offensive slur depending on context.
Sufferer. Used in disease-based compounds (-lijer).

words.context_notes: Slut. Derogatory term for women.
Loser. English loanword adapted to Dutch.
Boor, oaf. Mild insult for rude person.
Dick Hans. Compound: lul + hannes (name).
Dick cake. Means nonsense or bullshit. Compound: lul + koek (cake).
To talk shit (verb). From lul.
Little dick rose water. Means pussy or wimp. Creative compound phrase.

Macaque. Racial slur comparing people to monkeys. Highly offensive.
